query:
(SELECT  proceso, 'TOTAL' equipo,qty, pass, fail,  Round(pass/qty*100,2)  YIELD
FROM
(SELECT proceso, Count(pass_fail) Qty, Count(pass) PASS,Count(fail)Fail
   FROM
(SELECT SERIAL_NUM,PASS_FAIL, STEP_NAME proceso,
CASE WHEN PASS_FAIL ='P' THEN 'pass'
ELSE NULL
END pass,
CASE WHEN PASS_FAIL='F' THEN 'fail'
ELSE NULL
END fail ,
process_date,SYSTEM_ID,STEP_NAME,CYCLE_TIME
FROM PHASE2.LR4_SHIM_ASSEMBLY@MXOPTIX
--FROM LR4_SHIM_ASSEMBLY
WHERE process_date >= To_Date('2014-02-10 06:30:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND process_date <= To_Date('2014-02-11 06:30:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND (STEP_NAME IN ('TOSA SUBASSEM3 (SUBASSEM2, SI LENS)', 'LR4 OSA PLC ATTACH', 'LR4 GLASS LENS ATTACH') OR STEP_NAME LIKE 'ROSA SUBASSEM2 (SUBASSEM1, PD ARRAY%HEADER)'))
GROUP BY proceso HAVING COUNT(*) > 0 )
UNION all
SELECT  proceso,equipo, qty, pass, fail,  Round(pass/qty*100,2)  YIELD
FROM
(SELECT PROCESO,EQUIPO, Count(pass_fail) Qty, Count(pass) PASS,Count(fail)Fail
   FROM
  (SELECT SERIAL_NUM,PASS_FAIL, STEP_NAME proceso,
CASE WHEN PASS_FAIL ='P' THEN 'pass'
ELSE NULL
END pass,
CASE WHEN PASS_FAIL='F' THEN 'fail'
ELSE NULL
END fail ,
process_date,SYSTEM_ID EQUIPO,STEP_NAME,CYCLE_TIME, system_id
FROM PHASE2.lr4_shim_assembly@MXOPTIX
----FROM LR4_SHIM_ASSEMBLY
WHERE process_date >= To_Date('2014-02-10 06:30:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND process_date <= To_Date('2014-02-11 06:30:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND (STEP_NAME IN ('TOSA SUBASSEM3 (SUBASSEM2, SI LENS)', 'LR4 OSA PLC ATTACH', 'LR4 GLASS LENS ATTACH') OR STEP_NAME LIKE 'ROSA SUBASSEM2 (SUBASSEM1, PD ARRAY%HEADER)'))
GROUP BY EQUIPO,PROCESO HAVING COUNT(*) > 0
ORDER BY PROCESO))

ORDER BY proceso,equipo
